main event: Two large ball objects were seen moving from south to north and were in sight for a very short time.
interesting points: The objects were described as 'large ball' objects.
The objects were observed moving from south to north.
The sighting lasted for a very short time.
The report was from Project Blue Book, an official U.S. government program that investigated UFO sightings.
The location of the sighting was Black Smighport, Pennsylvania.
